name: La Signora
desc:
"The Eighth Harbinger" Signora

The crimson dawn was reflected in her pupils, and at last, she unfolded her flaming wings and flew towards the light.
"But that light is not the dawn, dear Rosalyne. That is a sea of flame that will consume everything."
Yet it mattered not, for she knew in her heart that the flames had devoured her long ago.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Bouquet of the Crimson Witch of Embers

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "There once was a legend concerning the Witch of Embers, who the historians are loath to remember. Her searing flames were like a bouquet. Even we cats have never forgotten it..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "La Signora" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Pain for Pain" equipped. End Phase: If "La Signora" has already changed into the "Crimson Witch of Embers" state, attach "Blazing Heat" to your active character. If she hasn't changed yet, "La Signora" loses 1 Energy, and "Sheer Cold" is attached to your active character.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Feathers of the Crimson Witch of Embers

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "In the wake of the witch's departure, her flames turned into feathers that floated on the wind, yet could neither be caught nor traced. As time passed, our memory of that scorching scent has gradually faded..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "La Signora" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Pain for Pain" equipped. End Phase: If "La Signora" has already changed into the "Crimson Witch of Embers" state, attach "Blazing Heat" to your active character. If she hasn't changed yet, "La Signora" loses 1 Energy, and "Sheer Cold" is attached to your active character.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

The crimson dawn was reflected in her pupils, and at last, she unfolded her flaming wings and flew towards the light.
"But that light is not the dawn, dear Rosalyne. That is a sea of flame that will consume everything."
Yet it mattered not, for she knew in her heart that the flames had devoured her long ago.

<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Bouquet of the Crimson Witch of Embers

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Signora

value.name: La Signora
value.desc:
Signora, the Eighth of the Fatui Harbingers.
Unlike other Fatui who use the authority granted by Delusions, her Delusion is meant to shackle a flame that will devour everything. As opposed to a weapon used to kill, it might be more fitting to consider this a tool of imprisonment.
And it was the embers of that flame, which had accumulated over many long years, that would break through the frosty seal of the Delusion and apply a warped rouge upon her.

The crimson dawn was reflected in her pupils, and at last, she unfolded her flaming wings and flew towards the light.
"But that light is not the dawn, dear Rosalyne. That is a sea of flame that will consume everything."
A voice spoke to her amidst the light.

Yet it mattered not, for she knew in her heart that the flames had devoured her long ago.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> . The target character receives <color=#ffffff>Sheer Cold</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Sheer Cold</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deals 1 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to attached character.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>
When attached character has <color=#ffffff>Blazing Heat</color> attached, remove this effect.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> , heals this character for 2 HP. Removes <color=#ffffff>Ice-Sealed Crimson Witch of Embers</color> . This character permanently switches to <color=#ffffff>Crimson Witch of Embers</color> state.
<color=#ece5d8>Ice-Sealed Crimson Witch of Embers</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the Action Phase starts:</color> If the attached character has no more than 4 HP, remove this effect.
<color=#ffffff>When attached character is defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure that character <color=#ffffff>will not be defeated</color> and heal them to 1 HP.
<color=#ffffff>When this effect is removed:</color> Attached character will transform into the <color=#ffffff>Crimson Witch of Embers</color> state.
<color=#ece5d8>Immunity to Defeat</color>
Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#ffffff>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.
When this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#ffffff>defeat</color> . (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)
<color=#ece5d8>Crimson Witch of Embers</color>
La Signora can permanently change into the "Crimson Witch of Embers" state.
After changing, La Signora's Elemental Type changes from <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> to <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> .
After changing, this character can use the skills of the Crimson Witch of Embers, but can no longer use La Signora's original skills.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#ffffff>Ice-Sealed Crimson Witch of Embers</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Ice-Sealed Crimson Witch of Embers</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the Action Phase starts:</color> If the attached character has no more than 4 HP, remove this effect.
<color=#ffffff>When attached character is defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure that character and heal them to 1 HP.
<color=#ffffff>When this effect is removed:</color> Attached character will transform into the <color=#ffffff>Crimson Witch of Embers</color> state.
<color=#ece5d8>Immunity to Defeat</color>
Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#ffffff>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.
When this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#ffffff>defeat</color> . (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)
<color=#ece5d8>Crimson Witch of Embers</color>
Signora can permanently change into the "Crimson Witch of Embers" state.
After changing, Signora's Elemental Type changes from <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> to <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> .
After changing, this character can use the skills of the Crimson Witch of Embers, but can no longer use Signora's original skills.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> . The target character received <color=#ffffff>Blazing Heat</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Blazing Heat</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deals 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to attached character.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>
When attached character has <color=#ffffff>Sheer Cold</color> attached, remove this effect.

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
